text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose
of daily new English phrases and words
brought to you by let's store
podcast.com
hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 100 in today's
episode I have a new word for you after
all let's find out what it means and how
you can use it in your daily
conversation enthrall there are certain
things that really fascinate you and you
are completely filled with wonder the
word enthrall basically means to charm
or to fascinate when something keeps you
completely interested and you give it
all your attention
it means it enthralls you it also means
to enslave or to make someone a slave if
a feeling or an idea enthralls someone
it influences everything that they think
or do for example when a movie enthralls
you
it means it delights or fascinates you
when a drug addiction has completely
enthralled someone it means they have
become a slave of drugs the word
enthrall is a verb it's passed form is
enthralled
and the past participle is also
enthralled the word enthralling is an
adjective as it describes something of
being fascinating and the word
enthralling ly is an adverb okay now
that you know what enthrall means let's
take a look at some example sentences to
see how you can use it in your daily
conversation example 1 the film director
won an award for his enthralling
action-packed reality based film example
2 the little boy was enthralled by the
colorful fireworks display on the New
Year's Eve example 3 the manager
enthralled his team with a humorous
speech while giving his presentation
example 4 Maria's father told her we are
all enthralled with the news of your
promotion at work example 5 the final
baseball match enthralled the spectators
as it was a very close one example 6
Titanic is one of the most enthralling
movies made in the recent past
example 7 nati can't get over her
enthralling mountain hiking experience
she had during her summer camp
example eight mrs. Baker was a popular
professor of the university she taught
the most boring subjects enthralling ly
example nine the roller coaster ride at
the amusement park was an enthralling
experience example ten in the 21st
century we are completely enthralled by
the power of computing technology that's
the end of today's episode have you ever
been enthralled by something kindly
share your experiences in the comment
box below this video thank you for
watching us do watch all the episodes of
daily video vocabulary to better your
English language skills do subscribe to
our Channel and stay updated with all
the latest lessons I will see you again
tomorrow with a new word or a phrase
till then
bye and take care
